alert.note: Alert for Latimer; Pittsburg; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 21 at 9:36PM CST until February 21 at 10:15PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Pushmataha County in southeastern Oklahoma... Southwestern Latimer County in southeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Pittsburg County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 1015 PM CST. * At 936 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Stringtown, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations in or near the path include... Clayton... Hartshorne... Clayton Lake State Park... Stanley... Dunbar... Haileyville... Sardis... Dow... TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for southeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
